title: Double S 301's Kim Hyung Jun begins teasing for his solo comeback! | allkpop.com
text: Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Double S 301's Kim Hyung Jun begins teasing for his solo comeback! By beansss 39 seconds ago 23 0 0 0 He's released his 1st teaser image for the upcoming comeback through Double S 301's official SNS, posing chicly in black and white. The album will be released in both Korean and Japanese, this March. What do you think the text on his teaser image means? YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
